HEAD_BOX.MAIN_1: There is an experience behind every review, that matters a lot.
HEAD_BOX.MAIN_2: Write reviews. Read reviews. Find new partners.
HEAD_BOX.MAIN_3: Are you interested in your company's BIX value? 1 click is all it takes:

MAIN_FEATURES_BOX.HEAD: Automated satisfaction measurement. Verified experiences. Management report. Reviews
MAIN_FEATURES_BOX.SUBHEAD: BIX answers the most important questions professionally!

FEATURE_1.TITLE: Automated satisfaction measurement
FEATURE_1.DESC: Know at all times, what your customers think. Serve them the way they want.

FEATURE_2.TITLE: Verified and authentic data
FEATURE_2.DESC: Work from authentic, phone-verified reviews. Avoid the misconceptions, don’t run into money-sinking dead ends.

FEATURE_3.TITLE: Professional management report
FEATURE_3.DESC: You will know from month to month how satisfied (or dissatisfied) your partners are and where to improve.

FEATURE_4.TITLE: Confidence-building reviews
FEATURE_4.DESC: Get new customers with the reviews of your existing customers. Generate leads using the BIX B2B rating.

MAIN_TESTIMONIAL_BOX.HEAD: BIX is special according to the !
MAIN_TESTIMONIAL_BOX.SUBHEAD: We didn't invent the wheel again - BIX is about rediscovering trust and about modern business decision support.

TESTIMONIAL_1.NAME: Barabás Árpád
TESTIMONIAL_1.TITLE: Barabás Téglakő
TESTIMONIAL_1.DESC: Zseniális, hogy mostantól minden munkatársunk folyamatosan figyel majd a partnerek elégedettségére, mert értékelés készül róla. A #BIX az ipar booking.com-ja.

TESTIMONIAL_2.NAME: Cserpes István
TESTIMONIAL_2.TITLE: Cserpes Sajtműhely
TESTIMONIAL_2.DESC: Lehet, hogy adatokat állítunk elő, de végül az egész a kapcsolatainkról szól. Ettől nagyszerű. Hogy megerősíti a partneri kapcsolatokat.

TESTIMONIAL_3.NAME: Markovich Béla
TESTIMONIAL_3.TITLE: Mapei
TESTIMONIAL_3.DESC: Ha valaki ránk keres a Google-ben, fontos neki, hogy találjon véleményeket. A BIX meg kiemelten és profin tálalja őket. Nekünk már hozott új megrendelőt.

HIGHLIGHTED_1.TITLE: Not measuring customer satisfaction yet? Or do you not have a professional automated system for it? BIX is every leader's dream!

HERO_1.SUBTITLE: Automated satisfaction measurement
HERO_1.TITLE: Know at all times what your customers think!
HERO_1.DESC: One satisfaction measurement a year? Come on. Traditional rating systems are outdated, provide too little information, too late. Save money, time and energy by automating the satisfaction measurement in your company. This way, you don't have to wait weeks or month for problems to show up and you can solve them immediately
HERO_1.Q: Why should you automate your satisfaction measurement?

A.A_1: It means constant care for existing customers
A.A_2: You will have the opportunity to act immediately
A.A_3: You get precise (and authentic) customer feedback
A.A_4: You can reactivate your old customers

CTA.CTA_1: I want to be up to date!

HERO_2.SUBTITLE: Verified and authentic data
HERO_2.TITLE: You can only make decisions with accurate information
HERO_2.DESC: For professional decision preparation, we also check our users' reviews by phone. To make your decisions as a leader even more informed, we merge our data with data provided by Bisnode. This gives you a complex knowledge package that combines financial and satisfaction data to minimize your managerial error rate.
HERO_2.Q: Therefore, it is worth working from authentic and verified information:

A.A_1: Rely on facts and not opinions
A.A_2: It will be revealed immediately if there is a problem with the customer
A.A_3: You increase and deepen the commitment of your customers
A.A_4: You generate referrals, gain new customers

HERO_3.SUBTITLE: Professional management report
HERO_3.TITLE: Month by month you see how satisfied your partners are (and where to improve)
HERO_3.DESC: Miért jó az, hogy minden hónap 10. napján megkapod a cégedre és munkakörödre (ügyvezető, marketingvezető stb.) szabott vezetői riportot? Könnyen átlátható, grafikus formában látod majd a „vevőid gondolkodását”, gyorsan értesülsz a vakfoltjaidról, a kapott objektív információk pedig utat mutatnak a termékfejlesztésben, javítják a terméked, szolgáltatásod ár-érték arányát, emelik a kiszolgálás minőségét és növelik a ügyfélmegtartó képességedet.
HERO_3.Q: That's why you'll love BIX's leadership reports:

A.A_1: It arrives like clockwork, you can plan with it

HERO_4.SUBTITLE: Confidence-building assessments
HERO_4.TITLE: Your future customers are most interested in the experience of your existing customers
HERO_4.DESC: A Google-ben keresők 86%-a ügyfélvéleményeket keres. A beszerzők ma már nemcsak a pénzügyi beszámolót nézik, hanem kifejezetten ügyfélvéleményekre keresnek rá. A potenciális ügyfeleid, beszállítóid a BIX – B2B rating profilod átnézése után könnyen és gyorsan döntenek majd melletted, hiszen a meglévő vásárlóid elégedettsége hitelesíti a termékedet, szolgáltatásodat. A BIX így konvertálja az ügyfeleid lojalitását első osztályú vevőszerző eszközzé.
HERO_4.Q: BIX - B2B rating helps in these areas

A.A_2: It sets you apart from the competition who doesn't use BIX
A.A_3: The public index supports SEO, better search positions

HIGHLIGHTED_2.TITLE: A professional platform that deals with my clients on my behalf

FEATURES_BOX.HEAD: BIX is already effective – and yet we improve
FEATURES_BOX.SUBHEAD: A product is never done. By fine-tuning and improving the system, our goal is to provide you with even more, more accure, even more useful information to help you build an even more successful company

FEATURE_1.TITLE: Google integration
FEATURE_1.DESC: Google highlights BIX profiles. This also indicates that the information we generate is valuable to search engines

FEATURE_2.TITLE: Expanding company database
FEATURE_2.DESC: We are constantly improving our company search, as more and more people are looking for a partner among BIX companies.

FEATURE_3.TITLE: BIX Profile
FEATURE_3.DESC: Your profile is a passport to success. You will get to know your future customers through this, so we will regularly add new features

FEATURE_4.TITLE: Custom measurement
FEATURE_4.DESC: Would you ask your partners something else? Together, we can build your own set of questions.

FEATURE_5.TITLE: My customer portal
FEATURE_5.DESC: Here you will find your accounts, manage your customer list, respond to reviews and update and edit your profile.
FEATURE_5.CTA: I check out the customer portal

FEATURE_6.TITLE: Extra data
FEATURE_6.DESC: From management reports, we already know who your best customers are and what is your most popular service. And this is just the beginning.

FEATURE_7.TITLE: Review collection
FEATURE_7.DESC: The customer list and rating system is the heart and engine of the system. Today, our reach efficiency is on average 35-40% and our numbers are constantly improving.

FEATURE_8.TITLE: Review renewal
FEATURE_8.DESC: Anyone who has already rated you will be asked again. Automatically, at specified intervals, keeping your business relationships alive and encouraging repurchases.

FEATURE_9.TITLE: Lead generation
FEATURE_9.DESC: Through information gathered during reviews, renewals, and phone verification, we are constantly refining our system to bring even more potential customers to you.

FEATURE_10.TITLE: Credibility building
FEATURE_10.DESC: Incorporate customer reviews delivered by BIX into your website, email signature, or footer on your website. Trust and credibility are the most valuable currencies in marketing.

FEATURE_11.TITLE: Integration
FEATURE_11.DESC: With the most important domestic billing software (#szamlazzhu) and CRM system (#minicrm) we already built the data bridge. But we don't stop here.

FEATURE_12.TITLE: Opinions gallery
FEATURE_12.DESC: Why put questionable customer feedback on your website if you can draw from both verified and objective sources? You can automatically transfer feedback from your customers from the BIX system.
